description: Spain is the first western European country and the sixth in the world to pass the landmark figure.
title: Coronavirus: Spain passes one million Covid-19 cases
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain passes one million Covid-19 cases - BBC News
maintext: But by the end of August new daily case numbers were rising by 10,000 a day. Hospital admissions have ticked up by 20% in the past two weeks alone, while deaths have also begun to rise, with the toll climbing by 218 on Tuesday.
